sentence.Network_en: It was a debate which aroused fervent ethical arguments.
sentence.Network_cn: 那是一场引发强烈的伦理道德争论的辩论.

sentence.Network_en: Could you tell her so for me, with my fervent acknowledgments?'
sentence.Network_cn: 你能把我这话向她转达么? 还有,对她的一片苦心我也衷心感谢.”

sentence.Network_en: She kept moving her lips in silent fervent prayer.
sentence.Network_cn: 她不停地蠕动着双唇热诚地默默祈祷着.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 雅思英语完整版_馆档网 ... ferry 渡船；渡口，摆渡 fervent 热烈的；热情的 festival 节日(的)，表演会期(的).
张红岩TOEFL ... fertilizer n. 肥料 fervent adj. 白热的，强烈的 fester v. 化脓.
SAT 单词必备!_百度文库 ... complimentary 称赞的,问候的 fervent 炽热的 appalling 令人震惊的.
热字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 热气〖 heat〗 热切〖 fervent;earnest〗 热情〖 enthusiasm〗.

list.abs: Our belief , and our fervent hope , is that the answer is No., 我们相信 , 并且热切的希望这一问题的答案是否定的.
Austria was among the most fervent supporters of Adolf Hitler ., 奥地利是阿道夫 · 希特勒最狂热的支持者之一.
口译词汇连载... ... It's not feasible to dismiss him. 不可开除他。 fervent love 热爱 a fictitious story 虚构的故事.
Firbank sent him his novels with fervent inscriptions ., 费班克送他的几部长篇小说 , 上面写着热烈的题词.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: via Old French from Latin fervent- 'boiling', from the verb fervere. Compare with fervid and fervour

entry.def: A fervent person has or shows strong feelings about something, and is very sincere and enthusiastic about it.

example.tran: 摩里索作品热忱的欣赏者

example.ex: ...the fervent hope that matters will be settled promptly.
example.tran: 对事情将迅速得到解决的热切希望

sentences.sentence: "a cordial regard for his visitor's comfort"
"the fervent heat...merely communicated a genial warmth to their half-torpid systems"- Nathaniel Hawthorne
"set out...when the fervid heat subsides"- Frances Trollope

auth_sentence.content: Obama, meanwhile, attracted legions of fervent volunteers.
auth_sentence.res_content: Obama, meanwhile, attracted legions of fervent volunteers.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Obama, meanwhile, attracted legions of fervent volunteers.

auth_sentence.content: He was a man of...fervent piety...and an exemplary parish priest.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was a man of...fervent piety...and an exemplary parish priest.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was a man of...fervent piety...and an exemplary parish priest.

auth_sentence.content: She was a fervent speaker for the Emancipation of Women.
auth_sentence.res_content: She was a fervent speaker for the Emancipation of Women.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: She was a fervent speaker for the Emancipation of Women.

stems_affixes.word_buile: ferv沸,热+id……的→adj.热的, 热心的
per自始至终+fervid[adj.热的, 热心的]→adj.非常热心的

sentences.cn: 那是一场引发强烈的伦理道德争论的辩论。
